name: Avoid having Methods and Functions without naming convention (PHP)
description:
This rule searches for all Functions and Methods that do not respect the naming convention.
Following are the naming convention that should be accepted:
If method name is not in camel case,violation will be reported.
If global function is neither in camel nor in snake case, violation will be reported.
output:
This report lists all Functions and Methods that do not respect the naming convention.

This QR provides the following information:
Function or Method full name.
rationale: Using naming convention makes the source code easier to read and therefore to maintain.
remediation: Modify the source code to reduce the number of Functions and Methods that do not respect the naming convention.
remediationSample:
<?php
		class foo {
   public function testClass() { // a method
     ........
   }
}
function foo_bar() {  // a function
.......  
}
function testBar() {  // a function
.......
}
